meanings.definition: A sailor or seaman from the East Indies.
meanings.sent1: The ship welcomed skilled lascars from the East Indies.
meanings.sent2: Many lascars worked hard on the ship's deck.
meanings.sent3: The lascars' dance on the ship entertained everyone.
meanings.sent4: The crew learned navigation tricks from the experienced lascars.
meanings.sent5: The colorful turbans of the lascars brightened the ship.

meanings.sent1: The captain trusted the experienced lascars with important tasks.
meanings.sent2: Lascars often shared stories of their adventures at sea.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous parrot mimicked the lascars' calls.
meanings.sent4: The storm tested the courage of the brave lascars.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful songs of the lascars echoed across the waves.
